c74object.name: maxscore.netscore
c74object.digest: Render a MaxScore score to a remote or local browser window
c74object.description:
MaxScore.NetScore
is used to transmit MaxScore generated scores to browser interfaces, a common application of which is to display real-time generated scores on smartphones and tablets. Based on the Websocket protocol. Creates HTML that can be used for posting online or emailing to clients to connect remotely without extra configuration on the client side for example.

objarg.name: sethtmlfilepath
objarg.description:
Opens a dialog to set file path to save rendered scores and html files.
Must match filepath chosen in NetScore.Server.jar for scores to be forwarded to connected clients.

objarg.name: writehtml
objarg.description: write html file to open in browser clients.

objarg.name: staffgroup
objarg.description:
select staffgroups, also defines the filename see maxscore.split.
Only 1 staffgroup produces a file called 1.png,
2 separate staffgroups produces a file called "1.png" and a file called "2.png" etc. For more detailed info
see maxscore.split

objarg.name: filename
objarg.description:
selected automatically through staffgroups, however sending "filename 499.png" for example also defines the filename. Must be an int lower than 500
Automatically defined via staffgroups also. Selecting only 1 staffgroup produces a file called 1.png,
2 separate staffgroups produces a file called "1.png" and a file called "2.png" etc. For more detailed info
see maxscore.split

objarg.name: setport
objarg.description: set the port that the server is configured to use for WebSocket communication (default 8080).

objarg.name: ftp
objarg.description:
ftp followed by a 1 sets the object to ftp upload mode, a 0 sets the mode to local storage only.
Graphics files are saved to disk in the specified or default location in both modes.
Must match filepath chosen in NetScore.Server.jar for scores to be forwarded to connected clients.

objarg.name: setserverip
objarg.description: Set IP address of server to use. Is used to encode the HTML page created by MaxScore.Netscore

method.name: writehtml
method.description: saves HTML file for use as client.
